Package eg.document

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EditingStateReadable
    The interface to read parameters related to the state of the document while it is edited
    TextChange
    The interface to edit text programmatically
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrentLanguage
    The language that is used depending on the type of file or user selection
    EditableDocument
    Represents the document that is edited
    Indentation
    The auto-indentation
    LineNumbers
    The line numbering
    TypingEdit
    Mediates between the editing of the document and the actions that happen in response
    UndoEdit
    The undo and redo editing.
